definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: My mother is one of the Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 我母親是衛理公會派教徒之一。

sentences.english: CKCMC is located in the State of Perak Manjung County.
sentences.chinese: 莫珍歪衛理公會是位於在霹靂州的曼隆縣。

sentences.english: Could you actually marry a Methodist?
sentences.chinese: 你能和衛理公會教徒結婚嗎？

sentences.english: The pregnancy progresses normally for Karen, an active member of the Panther Creek United Methodist Church in Morristown, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 凱倫住在田納西州莫里斯鎮，是衛理公會的虔誠信徒。

sentences.english: As a methodist he was a fervent advocate of temperance .
sentences.chinese: 身爲一名衛理公會教徒，他是禁慾的熱情擁護者。

sentences.english: She jest seems to have been born with a sort of chronic spite agin men and Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎天生就憎恨男人和衛理公會教徒。

sentences.english: The Wei Li Gong Hui methodist church in Jinfeng town, Fujian province, China. Photograph: Dan Chung for the Guardian
sentences.chinese: 中國福建金峯鎮，衛理公會教堂。

sentences.english: Other students on the SMU campus also had high hopes for the future.
sentences.chinese: 南衛理公會大學的其他學生也對未來抱有很高的期望。

sentences.english: I can still hear the sounds of those Methodist bells.
sentences.chinese: 衛理公會聖鍾之聲我還能聽見。

sentences.english: The main nonconformist groups in England are Methodist, Congregational and Baptist.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭主要的新教羣體有衛理公會，公理會和浸信會。
